name: Charming 1 Bedroom Marais Hideaway - FB17A

address.full_address: 17 Rue des Francs Bourgeois, 4th arr., 75004 Paris, France, 17 Rue des Francs Bourgeois, 75004, France

description:
Modern Comforts: Charming 1 Bedroom Marais Hideaway in Paris offers free WiFi, a fully equipped kitchen, and a washing machine. The apartment includes a living room with a sofa bed, dining area, and city views.

Convenient Facilities: Guests benefit from private check-in and check-out, a minimarket, hairdresser, family rooms, full-day security, and bicycle parking. Additional amenities include a walk-in shower, soundproofing, and parquet floors.

Prime Location: Located in the city center, the apartment is less than 0.6 mi from Opéra Bastille and Noter Dame Cathedral. Paris-Gare-de-Lyon is 1.2 mi away, while the Pompidou Center is a 12-minute walk. Paris Orly Airport is 11 mi distant.

Nearby Attractions: Nearby points of interest include the Louver Museum, Luxembourg Gardens, and Tuileries Garden. An ice-skating rink and boating are available in the surroundings.

You might be eligible for a Genius discount at Charming 1 Bedroom Marais Hideaway - FB17A. Sign in to check if a Genius discount is available for your selected dates.

Genius discounts at this property are subject to booking dates, stay dates, and other available deals.
